title: Replace website logo with custom design

requirements.text: Replace the existing Milletmist website logo with a new custom logo design

quotes: i want to change the logo of the website i already designed

acceptanceCriteria: New logo replaces the current logo in the Navigation component
New logo replaces the current logo in the Hero section
New logo replaces the current logo in the Footer component
Logo maintains consistent sizing and positioning across all components
Logo works correctly on both light and dark backgrounds where applicable

requirements.text: Render the generated custom logo as a static asset from frontend/public/assets/generated directory
acceptanceCriteria: Logo file is referenced from frontend/public/assets/generated path
Logo displays correctly in all locations where it appears
No routing through backend for logo asset delivery

constraints: Do not modify backend/main.mo as no backend changes are needed
Do not edit files in frontend/src/hooks/ directory

required: Professional logo design for Milletmist brand featuring millet grains and organic elements in warm earth tones (terracotta, amber, sage green), suitable for both light and dark backgrounds, modern and clean aesthetic (milletmist-logo.dim_400x400.png)
